title: Winter Olympics bid in 2026 being considered, Calgary mayor confirms
content: Toronto's decision not to bid for the 2024 Summer Olympics seems to have given Calgary's plans for a future Winter Games a boost. Calgary's mayor has acknowledged for the first time that a local group is working on a bid for the 2026 Winter Games. Two weeks ago, Naheed Nenshi laughed when asked about Calgary — which staged the Winter Games in 1988 — and whether the city would possibly be making another Olympic bid.
